person.persName: Ira G. Copley (Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Milley Copley. Father of Anna Copley, James Copley, Tennessee Copley, Samuel Copley, Poley Copley, William H. Copley, Genora Copley, Laura B. Copley. Married to Mary J. Smith on May 24, 1864. Father of Silas D. Copley. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia in 1850 and 1860. Served in the 5th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from 1861 to 1862.
